doc:
Michael Blodgett https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Blodgett 0 Michael Blodgett (September 26, 1939 – November 14, 2007) was an American actor, novelist, and screenwriter. Of his many film and television appearances he is best known for his performance as gigolo Lance Rocke in Russ Meyer's 1970 cult classic Beyond the Valley of the Dolls. He retired from acting in the late 1970s and began a writing career. Michael_Blodgett ( September_26_,_1939 – November_14_,_2007 ) was an_American_actor , novelist , and screenwriter . Of his_many_film_and_television_appearances he is_best_known for his_performance as gigolo_Lance_Rocke in Russ_Meyer 's_1970_cult classic Beyond the_Valley of the_Dolls . He retired from acting in the_late_1970s and began a_writing_career .
